original_text: But Joshua did not draw back his hand with which he stretched out the javelin until he had devoted all the inhabitants of Ai to destruction.
korean_text: 아이 주민들을 진멸하여 바치기까지 여호수아가 단창을 잡아 든 손을 거두지 아니하였고

sentences.original_text: But Joshua did not draw back his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 여호수아는 그의 손을 거두지 않았다

sentences.original_text: with which he stretched out the javelin
until he had devoted all the inhabitants of Ai to destruction
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아이 모든 거민을 진멸할 때까지
